data.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to Minecraft
data.meta_description: NEWSPAX (Penny Arcade Expo) Minecraft Panel!The 1.4 update is officially going to be called the 'Pretty Scary' update (the plan is to make it something of a Halloween
data.text:
NEWS

PAX (Penny Arcade Expo) Minecraft Panel!

The 1.4 update is officially going to be called the "Pretty Scary" update (the plan is to make it something of a Halloween release). And sadfaces for all, no API in version 1.4.

Snapshot 12w36a!

Wither updated to have a way to summon (4 soul sand in T shape, and 3 mob heads above it), drops Nether Star, which can be used to craft beacon blocks. Skeletons now spawn in the nether, also chance of spawning Wither Skeletons. Now you don't just ride backwards on a pig, control them with carrot on a stick! Chickens now use seeds to breed, pigs use carrots to breed (instead of wheat). Extra choices for superflat world generation (GUI not yet in game, but if you know how to manually edit savefiles, you can DOOO IT!)

The Hitchhiker's Guide To Minecraft

YOU DON'T HAVE TO BE A N00B.

Note: Find crafting recipes over at the minecraft wiki!

In this episode, you'll learn how to:

Make a survival world

Cut down trees, gather wood - hold down left button to destroy blocks

Make a crafting table

Make wooden tools

Start mining

Upgrade tools

Gather food

Find shelter

Gather materials - Coal, Iron, Gold, Lapis, Redstone, Diamonds, etc

Chad's favourite things!!1!

Digiex Minecraft Launcher

Breath underwater with Door.

Skyblock - by Noobcrew

Ending video: Zombie Hip-Hop Disco (Jump Around)

For additional show notes, including links to everything covered, visit http://OMGcraft.com/

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/OMGcraftShow

Email us at mail@omgcraft.com
